title: When is ornn out?
body: I thought he was coming out in 7.17 but he still isn't live. When will he be?

replies.body: He is available to unlock now!  :D

I'll quote the patch notes. "Ornn, the Fire Belor the Mountain, will be released during patch 7.17!"
He will probably be released in a couple hours or so as usual with new champion releases. Si just be patient.
<edit> He is live now <edit>
